sentences.en: Barcelona is the locus of Spanish industry.
sentences.cn: 巴塞罗那是西班牙工业中心。

sentences.en: Barcelona rates as one of the places with the highest quality of life for its citizens.
sentences.cn: 巴塞罗纳是为市民提供最高生活质量的城市之一.

sentences.en: Barcelona was chosen to be host of the 1992 Olympic games.
sentences.cn: 巴塞罗那获选为1992年奥运会的主办城市。

sentences.en: Barcelona will be hoping to bring the trophy back to Spain — sorry, Catalonia — for the first time.
sentences.cn: 巴塞罗那将有望首次把奖杯捧回西班牙——抱歉，是捧回加泰罗尼亚。

sentences.en: From LIANYUNGANG , cargo for PORT - KELANG, NAPLES , GENOA, BARCELONA , VALENCIA could be shipped.
sentences.cn: 由连云港可以接巴生 、 那不勒斯 、 热那亚、巴赛罗那 、 瓦伦西亚等地中海港口的货.
他离开巴塞罗那去了巴黎.

sentences.en: He was unable to travel to Barcelona with the rest of the team.
sentences.cn: 他未能和其他队员一起去巴塞罗那。

sentences.en: Hola Amigos, this is a great graffiti movie from Barcelona.
sentences.cn: 朋友们好, 这是一部关于巴塞罗拉的非常棒的涂鸦电影.

sentences.en: I made a weekend trip to Barcelona to see the cathedral.
sentences.cn: 我周末到巴塞罗那看大教堂去了.

sentences.en: I scored in both games against Barcelona; we drew at home and beat them away.
sentences.cn: 我在两场对阵巴塞罗那队的比赛中都进了球；我们在主场战平，在客场赢了他们。

sentences.en: I'll go to Barcelona and look for an editor so you can publish it.
sentences.cn: 我会去巴塞罗那寻找编辑这样你就能出版了.

sentences.en: Jane's goals helped Britain win third place in the Barcelona games.
sentences.cn: 简的进球帮助英国队在巴塞罗那奥运会上获得了第三名。

sentences.en: Real's victory keeps them five points behind the pacesetters, Barcelona.
sentences.cn: 皇家马德里队获胜，与领先的巴塞罗那队仍然保持着5分的差距。

sentences.en: Talking about their city is one of the favorite pastimes for the people of Barcelona.
sentences.cn: 对于巴塞罗纳人来说,谈论他们的城市是一种很好的消遣.

sentences.en: The aeroplane landed us at the airport in Barcelona.
sentences.cn: 飞机把我们降落在巴塞罗那机场。

sentences.en: The child of Barcelona will have just turned 22 in Sydney.
sentences.cn: 这位在巴塞罗那奥运会一举成名的佼佼者,到悉尼举办奥运时,刚好是22岁.

trans.tran_cn: 巴塞罗那（西班牙东北部港市）
巴塞罗那（西班牙东北部港口城市）
